page.title: 13CLUBS
page.content: CLUBS The West Midlands Shooting Ground is situated on the northern boundary of the area and is a thriving club, the ground being in almost constant use throughout the year. It is a recognized Championship course with competitors arriving from all parts of the country. There are about four major championships a year at present and the ground is hired out for private functions. There is the building of a new pavilion under construction and this will provide more employment in the preparation of food and drinks for entertainment purposes. The Stanton Walkers are a fairly newly formed club and by linking the footpaths and bridle path have formed a walk called The Shropshire Way. The club is very active with a small nucleus of members
